title: Number of retail chains in Poland 2019 , by sector
summary: This bar chart has 18 columns on the x axis representing Retail Categories, and Number of retail chains in each Retail Categories on the y axis.
The Number of retail chains is appeared to be the highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
The difference of Number of retail chains between the highest and lowest Retail Categories is 52.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Retail Categories in the x axis and Number of retail chains in the y axis.
The Number of retail chains is appeared to be the highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 18 columns on the x axis representing Retail Categories, and Number of retail chains in each Retail Categories on the y axis.
The Number of retail chains is appeared to be the highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
The difference of Number of retail chains between the highest and lowest Retail Categories is 52.0.
max_summary: This bar chart has 18 columns on the x axis representing Retail Categories, and Number of retail chains in each Retail Categories on the y axis.
The Number of retail chains is appeared to be the highest at Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing and lowest at Retail Categories Pet Care.
Second maximum Number of retail chains is found at Retail Categories Footwear & Leather.
The difference of Number of retail chains between the highest and lowest Retail Categories is 52.0.

Retail Categories Fashion & Clothing is higher than any other Retail Categoriess with value 57.0, followed by Footwear & Leather, and Footwear & Leather. Down to Retail Categories Pet Care with the lowest value 5.0.
Similar Number of retail chains is found in Retail Categories Toys & Games, Petrol, and Jewelry & Watches.
The Retail Categories Pet Care has 3.18 times less Number of retail chains than average.
Summing up the values of all Retail Categoriess, we get total 323.0.
